component.attributes:
&widget_var_attribute;
title true java.lang.String Title text for the dialog box.
bodyHeader false java.lang.String Header text for the body of the dialog. Does not apply if hasForm is true.
bodyContent false java.lang.String Content text for the body of the dialog. Does not apply if hasForm is true.
dismissTitle true java.lang.String Text for the dismiss button (or its equivalent) which closes the dialog without taking any other action.
confirmTitle true java.lang.String Text for the confirm button (or its equivalent) which closes the dialog after invoking the action function.
onConfirm false java.lang.String JavaScript functon to invoke when the user confirms the action described by the dialog. Takes either no arguments or a serialized form if hasForm is true.
hasForm false java.lang.Boolean false Set to true if the dialog contains a form. If so, supply a form layout object to the show method.
style false java.lang.String Inline style of the main container.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the main container.
titleStyleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the dialog title.
contentStyleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the dialog contents.
